articles.author: Bob Condotta
articles.title: Mariners do OK vs. Shohei Ohtani the pitcher, but struggle with him at the plate - The Seattle Times
articles.description: The Angels' two-way star had a big day at the plate, including a monstrous homer, which was enough to lift them to a win against the Mariners, 5-4.
articles.content:
ANAHEIM, Calif. As erratic as Shohei Ohtani was as a pitcher Friday night, he was even more electric as a hitter.
And that proved just enough to propel the Los Angeles Angels to a 5-4 victory over t… [+5343 chars]
